name: csharp-enhancements
description: C#-specific analysis enhancements for file summaries
additionalInstructions: Identify ALL attributes ([ApiController], [HttpGet], [Authorize], [DataMember], etc.) with their purposes
For classes: note if they are interfaces, abstract classes, sealed classes, static classes, or structs
Document inheritance and implemented interfaces explicitly
List access modifiers (public, private, protected, internal, protected internal) for each member
Note properties vs fields (auto-properties, get/set accessibility)
Identify async/await patterns and Task return types
For ASP.NET: document controller actions, route templates, HTTP methods, model binding
Note LINQ queries and their purposes
List events and delegates if present
Document generic type parameters and constraints (where T : class, new())
Identify dependency injection in constructors (especially in ASP.NET Core)
Note nullable reference types usage (string? vs string)
